content.title: Run the App
content.body:
1. From the Live Preview Settings window, under Platforms and Channels, select Responsive Web.
    Ensure that you have unselected the checkboxes for all the other platforms and channels.
  2. Click Save & Run.
    It may take some time for Iris to show the Iris Preview window.

You can view the data you added on the form in Iris Preview.
